concept.title: AirClassroom Prices for Shanks 360
concept.shortdesc: We strive to give you the fairest price for our space. Our prices are non-negotiable, but we have taken every measure to make sure that they are the fairest deal you'll get.

conbody.p: Below you'll find the detailed price breakdown for our space, so that you can see which package best fits your needs.

row.entry: Platinum Room with all inclusive Computer, Internet and Adobe Creative Cloud
Student Platinum Room with all inclusive Computer, Internet and Adobe Creative Cloud (Student discount)
Student Gold Room without Computer Access (Student discount)
Hokie Platinum Room with all inclusive Computer, Internet and Adobe Creative Cloud (VT Student discount)
Hokie Gold Room without Computer Access (VT Student discount)
